accounts.name: randomnessService
docs: The Solana Randomness Service program.

accounts.name: randomnessRequest
docs: The account that will be created on-chain to hold the randomness request.
Used by the off-chain oracle to pickup the request and fulfill it.

accounts.name: randomnessEscrow
docs: The TokenAccount that will store the funds for the randomness request.

accounts.name: randomnessState
docs: The randomness service's state account. Responsible for storing the
reward escrow and the cost per random byte.

accounts.name: randomnessMint
docs: The token mint to use for paying for randomness requests.

accounts.name: payer
docs: The account that will pay for the randomness request.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana System program. Used to allocate space on-chain for the randomness_request account.

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: The Solana Token program. Used to transfer funds to the randomness escrow.

accounts.name: associatedTokenProgram
docs: The Solana Associated Token program. Used to create the TokenAccount for the randomness escrow.

fields.name: total
docs: the current number of entrants

fields.name: max
docs: the max nuber of entrants

fields.name: raffleFee
docs: the amount in sol to set up a raffle (8)

fields.name: proceedsShare
docs: the percentage in basis points of proceeds share (2)

fields.name: slugs
docs: a vector storing all slugs (4)

fields.name: bump
docs: the bump of the program_config account (1)

fields.name: raffler
docs: raffler account that owns this raffle (32)

fields.name: entrants
docs: the account the holds the entrants array (32)

fields.name: prize
docs: mint address of the prize (32)

fields.name: randomness
docs: randomness from VRF (1 + 32)

fields.name: entryType
docs: type of entry - Token or NFT (1 + 32 + 8)

fields.name: paymentType
docs: how do entrants pay for entries (1 + 8)

fields.name: gatedCollection
docs: gate to only holders of a specific collection

fields.name: startTime
docs: timestamp of raffle start (8)

fields.name: endTime
docs: timestamp of raffle end (8)

fields.name: claimed
docs: has the prize been claimed? (1)

fields.name: maxEntrantPct
docs: basis points of the maximum amount of tickets a single user can buy (2)

fields.name: unlimited
docs: does this raffle have unlimited tickets? (1)

fields.name: bump
docs: bump for the raffle PDA (1)

fields.name: authority
docs: The authority of the raffler (32)

fields.name: slug
docs: slug, max 50 chars (50 + 4)

fields.name: name
docs: name of the project, max 50 chars (50 + 4)

fields.name: treasury
docs: receives the raffle proceeds (32)

fields.name: customDomain
docs: optional custom domain, max 50 chars (1 + 4 + 50),

fields.name: isActive
docs: Raffle status (1)

fields.name: theme
docs: the theme of the raffler (1 + 32)

fields.name: staker
docs: pubkey of linked staker app (1 + 32)

fields.name: bump
docs: bump (1)

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: The signer is not permitted to perform this action

errors.name: TokenNotNFT
errors.msg: The provided token is not an NFT

errors.name: RaffleTooLong
errors.msg: The max duration for a raffle is 30 days

errors.name: RaffleTooShort
errors.msg: The min duration for a raffle is 5 minutes

errors.name: InvalidStartTime
errors.msg: Start date must be in the future, or leave blank for now

errors.name: TooManyTickets
errors.msg: The max tickets for a raffle is 65,535

errors.name: SoldOut
errors.msg: No tickets left for this raffle!

errors.name: NotStarted
errors.msg: Raffle has not started yet

errors.name: Ended
errors.msg: Raffle has ended

errors.name: ProgramAddError
errors.msg: Error adding numbers

errors.name: ProgramSubError
errors.msg: Error subtracting numbers

errors.name: ProgramMulError
errors.msg: Error multiplying numbers

errors.name: InvalidTokenMint
errors.msg: Invalid token mint provided for this raffle

errors.name: TokenMintUnexpected
errors.msg: Unexpected token_mint account

errors.name: NftUnexpected
errors.msg: Unexpected NFT mint account

errors.name: TokenUnexpected
errors.msg: Unexpected token mint account

errors.name: AdminOnly
errors.msg: This is an admin only function

errors.name: InvalidAccountData
errors.msg: Invalid account data

errors.name: SlugTooLong
errors.msg: Slug can only be a maximum of 50 chars

errors.name: SlugRequired
errors.msg: Slug is required

errors.name: NameTooLong
errors.msg: Project name can only be a maximum of 50 chars

errors.name: NameRequired
errors.msg: Project name is required

errors.name: InvalidSlug
errors.msg: Slug can only contain valid URL slug chars

errors.name: SlugExists
errors.msg: Slug already exists

errors.name: WinnerAlreadyDrawn
errors.msg: Winner already drawn

errors.name: WinnerNotDrawn
errors.msg: Winner not drawn

errors.name: OnlyAdminCanClaim
errors.msg: Only the raffle admin can claim prize from raffle with no entries

errors.name: NotWinner
errors.msg: Only the winner can claim

errors.name: TicketNotWinner
errors.msg: This ticket is not the winning ticket

errors.name: AlreadyClaimed
errors.msg: This prize has already been claimed

errors.name: InvalidCollection
errors.msg: Invalid collection. Only MCC can be used

errors.name: OnlyWinnerOrAdminCanSettle
errors.msg: Only the winner or raffle admin can settle the raffle

errors.name: TreasuryTokenAccountNeeded
errors.msg: Treasury token accout must be provided

errors.name: NftInstruction
errors.msg: This instruction can only be used with NFT payment type raffles

errors.name: TokenInstruction
errors.msg: This instruction can only be used with token payment type raffles

errors.name: RaffleNotEnded
errors.msg: This raffle has not ended yet

errors.name: NotDrawn
errors.msg: This raffle has not been drawn yet

errors.name: GatedRaffle
errors.msg: Entrant doesn't hold a required NFT to enter this raffle

errors.name: TicketPriceRequired
errors.msg: Ticket price required for token raffle

errors.name: UnexpectedEntryCollectionMint
errors.msg: Unexpected entry collection mint for token raffle

errors.name: ExpectedEntryCollectionMint
errors.msg: Expected entry collection mint for NFT raffle

errors.name: UnexpectedTicketPrice
errors.msg: Unexpected ticket price for NFT raffle

errors.name: InvalidInstruction
errors.msg: This instruction cannot be used for this raffle

errors.name: BurnProceedsToken
errors.msg: Cannot withold burn proceeds for a token raffle

errors.name: BurnProceedsNotBurn
errors.msg: Cannot withold burn proceeds is not set to burn

errors.name: WitholdBurnTokenVaultNeeded
errors.msg: token_vault required if witholding burn proceeds

errors.name: CannotBurnSOL
errors.msg: cannot set up a burn raffle with SOL
